AN ODE TO POTENTIAL (OR: AN ODE TO EVERYTHING THAT COULD BE, SHOULD BE AND WILL BE)

Someone told me that there is something greater in all of us. And that once you see this, you see beauty in everything and each and everyone. I saw you the other day and knew one thing for sure. The more you do you, the easier it is for others to shine. And when shiny people get together, everything changes for good. So, today is the day and here’s the plan: let’s do this. Together. RAD radical lovers of everything about you. [SAXOPHONE SOLO]
